pageContent: Purpose/objectives: To compare the quality-of-life (QOL) perceptions of men treated for prostate cancer with surgery to those of men treated for prostate cancer with radiation therapy.

metaData.source:
Gene Expression-Based Immune Cell Infiltration Analyses of Prostate Cancer and Their Associations with Survival Outcome
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32460527/
